A couple of cool ideas for the WBC 50 Hikes Challenge.

### 1. Apple Guides (First concept for WBC 50)

From the Apple support page on how to use Guides:

> *Explore new places with Guides in Maps on iPhone.  Guides from trusted brands and partners are available in the Maps app*

> *In the Maps app <img src="https://help.apple.com/assets/5FD260DB680CE26D5580207C/5FD260DF680CE26D558020B0/en_US/089762aa58157ec3e9bdd4e42a6c3424.png" alt="" height="20" width="20">, you can organize places into your own guides.  Add a place to your Guides on your iPhone: Tap “Save to,” then choose one of your guides.*

* Works great to validate.  Doesn't have to be the final map, but it gets us 95% of the way there
* [Apple Guides](https://guides.apple.com/?%2FhTrdI1AQBEh%%2BKAkzE4NzU1IFNhbiBQYXNxdWFsIFZhbGxleSBSZCwgUmFtb25hLCBDQSAgOTIwMjcsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEgkx1%2F2%2B2opAQBG%2FRLx1%2FjpdwCoWQ2xldmVuZ2VyIENhbnlvbiBTb3V0aBJzGjoxNjQxNCBCYW5keSBDYW55b24gUmQsIEVzY29uZGlkbywgQ0EgIDkyMDI1LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJ7KEm%2BeqJQEARoSfSFjM%2FXcAqIUNvYXN0IHRvIENyZXN0IFNhbiBQYXNxdWFsIFZhbGxleRJ7GklEYWxleSBSYW5jaCwgMjE1N%2BKAkzIxODMgTGEgSG9uZGEgRHIsIEVzY29uZGlkbywgQ0EgIDkyMDI3LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJgBU7dUCVQEARZRKayVxDXcAqGkRhbGV5IFJhbmNoIC0gQm91bGRlciBMb29wEg4Irk0Q2aCp%%2BaPxIOCK5NEJ63meK6j%2Br0gwESZBo8TW91bnQgV29vZHNvbiBDb3VudHJ5IENsdWIsIFJhbW9uYSwgQ0EgIDkyMDY1LCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJe%2FXx0HeBQEARuD8XDRk9XcAqEEZyeSBLb2VnZWwgVHJhaWwSaho9NDAwM%2BKAkzQwOTkgSGVsbGVycyBCZW5kLCBGYWxsYnJvb2ssIENBICA5MjAyOCwgVW5pdGVkIFN0YXRlcyISCY7w5dBVqEBAEbjOisr7Tl3AKhVIZWxsZXJzIEJlbmQgUHJlc2VydmUSDgiuTRCMup%%2Fs3KpLOtpAESYBo7TG9zIEppbGd1ZXJvcyBQcmVzZXJ2ZSwgRmFsbGJyb29rLCBDQSAgOTIwMjgsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEgkw4%%2BtLxxzddwCoaT2JzZXJ2YXRvcnkgVHJhaWwgT3Zlcmxvb3ASTBopUGFtbyBSZCwgUmFtb25hLCBDQSAgOTIwNjUsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEgl81rDEXI1AQBFIAAnh1TZdwCoLUGFtbyBWYWxsZXkSaRo6MTkzMjQgUyBTYW50ZWUgTG4sIFZhbGxleSBDZW50ZXIsIENBICA5MjA4MiwgVW5pdGVkIFN0YXRlcyISCeLxPh%2B5m0BAERB9O8LJO13AKhdQYXJhZGlzZSBNb3VudGFpbiBUcmFpbBIOCK5NEIeTr%2F6n3of%2F4gESbBo4MjAyNTAgUXVlc3RoYXZlbiBSZCwgRXNjb25kaWRvLCBDQSAgOTIwMjksIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEgkyYHYpOYpAQBGW2qT8mkpdwCocUXVlc3RoYXZlbiBSb2FkIE5hdHVyZSBUcmFpbBINCK5NEICA85O6qPfdFBIOCK5NEPa4q6iw6d%2FylQESDQiuTRC%2B0qPiut3%2B5TISDgiuTRCzhtbYybKq86cBEngaOzIyMjU54oCTMjI5MzMgQ0EtNzksIFNhbnRhIFlzYWJlbCwgQ0EgIDkyMDcwLCBVbml0ZWQgU3RhdGVzIhIJnM2JZj%2BQQEARSlYSPm0rXcAqJVNhbnRhIFlzYWJlbCBPcGVuIFNwYWNlIFByZXNlcnZlIEVhc3QSDQiuTRDt5OmH0%2B%2FerR0ScRpBMTYyMzfigJMxNjI0MSBTeWNhbW9yZSBDYW55b24gUmQsIFBvd2F5LCBDQSAgOTIwNjQsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEglYr43bbXhAQBH6jo7ywT5dwCoYU3ljYW1vcmUgQ2FueW9uIFByZXNlcnZlElYaLlR3aW4gUGVha3MgUmQsIFBvd2F5LCBDQSAgOTIwNjQsIFVuaXRlZCBTdGF0ZXMiEglAM7442nxAQBHCGHcA%%3D){target="_blank"}
